plot: As Kokonotsu continues on his path to become a manga artist, Hotaru refuses to give up on bringing him to the side of Japanese snack foods. With new faces and new tasty treats to try, Kokonotsu might be swayed to take over his father's sweet shop or finally move on from this small town and follow his manga dreams.
opening_theme: "Oh My Sugar Feeling!!" by Ayana Taketatsu
ending_theme: "Okashina Watashi to Hachimitsu no Kimi" (おかしなわたしとはちみつのきみ) by Hachimitsu Rocket
